description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Effect Your animal companion screeches and howls, empowered with natural magic. All creatures in a @Template[cone|distance:30] take @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))d6[sonic]] damage for every 2 levels your companion has, with a @Check[fortitude|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. Creatures that fail become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}, and creatures that critically fail become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}. The fright is an emotion, fear, and mental effect.
